headline: CarMax (KMX): Is the Used-Car Leader’s 38% Share Price Drop a True Value Opportunity?
summary: CarMax (KMX) shares have had a challenging year, dipping nearly 38% over the past 12 months. Amid changing dynamics in the used-car market, many investors are revisiting what is driving the ongoing performance of this industry leader. See our latest analysis for CarMax. CarMax’s share price has faced steady downward pressure this year, closing most recently at $46.07 and leaving the stock with a 1-year total shareholder return of -38%. The used-car market’s shifting landscape has fueled...

headline: New Strong Sell Stocks for October 3rd
summary: LSPD, KMX and BLMN have been added to the Zacks Rank #5 (Strong Sell) List on October 3, 2025.
